00019 #ifndef _IPL98_PIXELGROUPS_H
00020 #define _IPL98_PIXELGROUPS_H

00023 #include "pixelgroup.h"
00024 #include <vector>
00025 
00026 namespace ipl{ // use namespace ipl
00027 
00028 using std::vector;
00029 
00040 class CPixelGroups {
00041         private: // attributes
00043                 TPixelGroups m_Groups;
00045                 vector<CPixelGroup*> m_pCGroups;
00046         protected: // attributes
00047         public: // methods
00049                 CPixelGroups();
00053                 CPixelGroups(unsigned int InitialSize);
00056                 CPixelGroups(const CPixelGroups& SourceGroups);
00058                 CPixelGroups& operator=(const CPixelGroups& SourceGroups);
00062                 CPixelGroup& operator[](unsigned int Index);
00064                 ~CPixelGroups();
00067                 void Empty();
00071                 unsigned int GetTotalGroups() const;
00077                 CPixelGroup* GetGroup(unsigned int Index) const;
00083                 const TPixelGroups* GetConstTPixelGroupsPtr() const;
00089                 TPixelGroups* GetTPixelGroupsPtr();
00093                 void Update();
00098                 void AddGroup(const CPixelGroup& PixelGroup);
00104                 bool InsertGroupInGroups(const CPixelGroup& PixelGroup, unsigned int Index);
00112                 bool AddColors(const CStdImage& Source);
00120                 bool RemoveGroup(unsigned int GroupIndex);
00125                 bool RemoveGroupSlow(unsigned int GroupIndex);
00134                 bool GetGroupWithPos(unsigned int& GroupIndex,const CPoint2D<INT16>& Pos,
00135                                                 unsigned int& PosIndex);
00142                 bool GetGroupWithPos(unsigned int& GroupIndex,const CPoint2D<INT16>& Pos);
00144                 void PrintInfo();
00146                 friend ostream& operator<<(ostream& s,const CPixelGroups& Groups);
00147         private:
00148                 // Used when inserting or removing a group somewhere in the array
00149                 void UpdateAll();
00150 };
00151 
00155 
00156 inline CPixelGroup& CPixelGroups::operator[](unsigned int Index)
00157 {
00158         return *(m_pCGroups[Index]);
00159 }
00160 
00161 } // end namespace ipl
